name: Tiny Venture
description:
Our entry for Ludum Dare 38

Survive for as long as possible on a (tiny) alien planet, gathering strange flora to fulfill your needs.

Also includes a tourism (god) mode for those who want to admire the scenery without the time pressure of a survival game.

It's been a while since we last did a jam, but we're happy with the result.

Credits:
Daniel Cohen (Code, Design, Sound) - https://www.dcohen.co.uk
Kathryn Zalecka (3D Art) - http://kathrynzalecka.com/
